newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexican daily port, shipping update for May 23.
newsitem.headline: Mexican daily port, shipping update for May 23.

text.p: - All Mexican ports were open on Friday, the Communications and Transport Ministry (SCT) said in its 1500 local/2100 GMT daily meteorological report.
Puerto Penasco port in Sonora state was closed to smaller tourism and fishing boats because of strong wind speeds and waves.
The ministry updated port conditions and shipping warnings for the Pacific Coast, Gulf of Mexico and Caribbean.
Generally clear skies and maximum winds of 10 to 15 knots (19 to 28 km/11 to 16 miles per hour) and waves three to six feet high.
Some light rains and clouds. Maximum winds from 10 to 15 knots and waves from three to six feet high.
Hot and partly cloudy with rains. Winds from 20 to 30 km per hour.
